itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, April 2, 2014
byline: Karen Clark, David Brancaccio, Mitchell Hartman, Sally Herships and Kate Davidson
teaser: Among the biggest donors to food banks and other social-service agencies are corporations including Walmart and Kroger’s- a sometimes awkward partnership, since of the people served by these agencies are employees of these stores. Later, we talk to Allan Sloan about a tax-avoidance deal that is making it possible for some companies to save hundreds of millions of dollars, legally.
